featured.text: In Song of Solomon, for example, Morrison tells the story of an African American man and his search for identity in his culture.

definition.zh_def: 所羅門，古代以色列的國王，以智慧和公正著稱，常被視為智慧的象徵。
definition.en_def: Solomon, a king of ancient Israel renowned for his wisdom and fairness, often regarded as a symbol of wisdom.
definition.example: King Solomon is famous for his wise judgment in the case of two women claiming to be the mother of the same baby.
